programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan S1 Ep5242
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Taste of Life S1 Ep251
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: Taste of Life S1 Ep252
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go S1 Ep3313
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef S1 Ep4134
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Just Eat S1 Ep63
programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: Hot Door Night S1 Ep2434
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness S1 Ep204
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan S1 Ep5243
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: Life Hotel
programme.desc: Once a gangster, Li struggles to find work to pay for his father's heart surgery. To earn money, he goes undercover to help shut down Life Hotel for a redevelopment project, but gradually forms bonds with its residents. As Li discovers that the hotel serves as a home for the sick, he grapples with his sense of responsibility and empathy.

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: Detective vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: No One Like Me
programme.desc: Yang Qian Huan, the third disciple of the Imperial Astronomer, was once a golden boy. However, since the birth of Xu Qi An, his glory has waned. His relentless pursuit cannot defy a merciless truth: all has been foretold. Yet rising from his downfall, Yang defiantly forges his own path, refusing to bow to fate.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. Mei Jing of the Thunderbolt Women's Commando Unit, leads her team to attack the drug base, but they are being ambushed and the identity of Mei's father as an undercover is exposed. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his son's talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Fight Back to School III
programme.desc: The millionaire, Million Wong , is found dead in a hotel room. Officer Sing Sing (Stephen Chow) is called in when a man is murdered with an ice pick during sexual intercourse. By an uncanny coincidence the man looks identical to Sing so the decision is made to send him in as an undercover again for further investigation. In the same day, he finds himself with a beautiful wife (Anita Mui), an incompetent sidekick (Anthony Wong) and one very unhappy girlfriend (Cheung Man). All this and somehow he still has to try and solve the case!

programme.title: The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Wang's odd behaviour and quirky ideas make him a social outcast. His teenage nephew Zhou, who is ashamed of his stutter, becomes Wang's only friend. Together, these misfits challenge traditional family expectations and social misunderstandings, supporting and inspiring each other as they seek their own paths in life.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong's legendary detective?

programme.title: No One Like Me
programme.desc: Yang Qian Huan, the third disciple of the Imperial Astronomer, was once a golden boy. However, since the birth of Xu Qi An, his glory has waned. His relentless pursuit cannot defy a merciless truth: all has been foretold. Yet rising from his downfall, Yang defiantly forges his own path, refusing to bow to fate.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong
programme.desc: Ng Shun and his family return to the public housing estate where he grew up, not to visit his aging father, but to seek refuge after his business has failed. When his family of five squeeze into the small estate unit, Ng Shun is forced to face his long-neglected family problems...

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi's actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Bursting Point
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Bang sends Officer Ming undercover to a drug cartel to displace drug lord Yang. A failed raid triggers Yang's rage for revenge. Meanwhile, drug maker Ying Xiu is forced to cooperate with the police and sets a trap for Yang. The battle between the police and the drug cartel has just begun!

programme.title: The Calling Of A Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend's wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge - will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Liu's family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect's Zhang Chui Shan's son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Once in a Blue Moon
programme.desc: Mei Zhen's family appears to get along but harbours deep secrets. Mei Zhen is trapped in a dead-end job with a toxic boss, her brother hides his separation and their mother grapples with lingering guilt over her husband's departure years ago. As Mid-Autumn Festival approaches, can the family heal their wounds and find a way back to each other?

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk witnesses a suspect's murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Lau's investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: Everything Is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his father's death

programme.title: Cesium Fallout
programme.desc: A massive fire caused by illegal garbage smuggling has triggered a radiation crisis in Hong Kong. Government advisor Simon joins the crisis response team led by Acting Chief Executive to avert the disaster. A fire brigade is tasked to enter the radiation zone and stop the cesium fallout. Facing the unprecedented catastrophe, can they save the city?

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Mei's dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the child's unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister's wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fianc, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas' pursuit.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called The Venoms, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend's baby...

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu's enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a swordsman who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonour. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant's confusion, threatening the couple's union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world but she is unable to choose between both men even as they face a deadly duel.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: Honey Bunny Ka Jholmaal S1 Ep8
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.title: The Legend Of Tarzan (2016) S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Legend Of Tarzan - A new live-action adventure from director David Yates (Harry Potter films) brings Edgar Rice Burroughs' legendary character back to the big screen. It's been years since the man once known as Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgard --True Blood) left the jungles of Africa behind for a gentrified life as John Clayton III, Lord Greystoke, with his beloved wife, Jane (Margot Robbie -- The Wolf of Wall Street) at his side. Now, he has been invited back to the Congo to serve as a trade emissary of Parliament, unaware that he is a pawn in a deadly convergence of greed and revenge, masterminded by the Belgian, Captain Leon Rom (Oscar winner Christoph Waltz). But those behind the murderous plot have no idea what they are about to unleash.

programme.title: HELLBOY
programme.desc: This supernatural action-adventure is based on Mike Mignola's acclaimed Dark Horse Comics series. Brought to Earth by evil genius Rasputin (Karel Roden) to aid the Nazis in their dying cause, Hellboy (Ron Perlman) was rescued by Professor Broom (John Hurt), founder of the clandestine B.P.R.D. (Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense), who raised him and developed his extraordinary paranormal gifts. Despite his dark origins, Hellboy becomes an unlikely champion for good, battling the evil forces that threaten our world along with a telepathic mer-man (Doug Jones) and a pyro-kinetic (Selma Blair). Hidden from the society they are assigned to protect, they are the key line of defense against Rasputin, who seeks to reclaim Hellboy to the dark side and use his powers to bring about Armageddon.

programme.title: FANTASY ISLAND S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Paymer vs. Paymer - Empty nesters Dolly and Dutch seek clarity on how to spend their next chapter, Helene helps Ruby tap into her newfound youth, Javier opens up to Roarke as he wrestles with his new role.

programme.title: FANTASY ISLAND S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Mystery In Miami - Three best friends set out to track down the missing fourth member of their squad... in 1980s Miami, Roarke confides in Segundo about letting people in, Ruby's cabin fever is an itch that needs to be scratched.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep10
programme.desc: In BOSTON BLUE, a universe expansion of the long-running top drama BLUE BLOODS, Wahlberg will reprise his role as NYPD officer Danny Reagan as he takes a position with Boston PD. programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS S2 Ep2

programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The CSI team investigates the death of a local antique shop owner who died from an apparent gunshot wound that is missing one important clue - the bullet. Also, Max makes an important breakthrough in the ongoing case with Ocho from the robotics factory.

programme.title: FBI S6 Ep9
programme.desc: Best Laid Plans - When a retired FBI agent is tortured and killed while working a security job, Scola and Nina (FBI: MOST WANTED) go undercover as a married couple deep in the diamond game as the team tries to find out who is responsible. During the course of his and Nina's dangerous assignment, Scola is plagued by the possibility that their son Doug could end up parentless.

programme.desc: Jennifer Lawrence and Chris Pratt star in a high-stakes adventure about two passengers, Aurora and Jim, onboard a spaceship transporting them to a new life on another planet. The trip takes a deadly turn when their hibernation pods mysteriously wake them 90 years before they reach their destination. As they try to unravel the mystery behind the malfunction, they discover that the ship itself is in grave danger. With the lives of 5,000 sleeping passengers at stake, only Jim and Aurora can save them all.

programme.desc: The Situation Is Desperate, But As The God Of War's Daughter, I Will Defeat The Enemy With Brute Strength - Jill, betrayed and imprisoned, wakes in the past. To change her fate, she makes a choice that alters love and destiny.

programme.title: Oshi No Ko S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Adaptation - Thanks to Akane, Aqua watches Tokyo BLADE's stage play, confirming GOA's talent and inspiring him to take action!

programme.title: Oshi No Ko S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Emotional Acting - After seeing GOA's play, Abiko recognizes his talent but sets a condition for his next script. As it's completed, Aqua faces a new trial...!

programme.title: Oshi No Ko S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Opening - Why does Aqua, who claims to have no talent, persist in acting? Akane hears his true feelings and makes a bold request.

programme.title: Oshi No Ko S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Growing - Aiyu feels inadequate among Tokyo Blade's cast. Regretting Sweet Today, he trains hard, but Aqua's secret technique is...?!

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Arrival In Okinawa - The Peek-a-Boo members arrive in Okinawa! After checking out their gorgeous vacation home, the group decides to head to the beach. In order to make sure the guys don't try to get naked, they decide to go to a popular beach with lots of visitors, where they have some wild fun on a banana boat. However, Iori loses their banana boat contest and ends up having to sleep in Nanaka and Azusa's room!

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep11
programme.desc: You Have The Wrong Idea - "You might be the only one who can't pass the license test," Nanaka says to Iori, pointing out what he's bad at. To avoid being made fun of by Kohei and Nanaka, he practices secretly. Yet, while practice, all he thinks of is how to poison them at dinner.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Otori - For the last half of their trip, the Peek-A-Boo members arrive in Miyakojima. Everyone goes for a serious dive into the majestic sea with the exception of Iori, who couldn't obtain his license. Everything is magical with the stunning coral reef, colorful fishes and sea turtles, until the members engage in PaB-style Otori (a drinking custom of Miyakojima), which turns things into a living hell...

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Keiko's Carefree Style / Secret Urges / Jekyll Visits The Otogi House - Keigo was troubled because the viewers on his channel weren't increasing. He talks to his roommates Nico, Morihito, Kanshi, and Miharu about it, but he just gets a blunt, Because it's not interesting! In order to liven it up, she asks if she could appear in his channel, but Morihito says no. That's when Nico comes up with a great idea.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep22
programme.desc: The Incredible Shrinking Adventure / The Hamazaki Fall Bread Festival / Lucky Birhtday - Nico, Kara, and Morihito are having a donut devouring party in Nico's room. When something bad happens or whenever you get tired, then you need to eat donuts! Nico thinks that every girl should experience the ever-wonderful candy land world, so she casts a spell to shrink their sizes so they can roll around in donuts!

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Our First Offline Meetup / Fave Artist File: Creative Surge / Fave Artist File: Crazy Event Arc - Ms. Makuwa and Kuku are hard at work for their Uron Mirage dojinshi. Ms. Makuwa is in charge of writing and boarding out the story, but is struggling to complete it to the way she likes. In the meantime, Kuku will practice her art since she has time until the event. Kuku also reveals to Ms. Makuwa that she became friends with someone online who replies to her on Chitter. They were going to have an offline meetup the next day. Sick with worry, Ms. Makuwa decides to secretly follow her to the meetup.

programme.title: Why Raeliana Ended Up At The Duke's Mansion S1 Ep10

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: New York "date doctor" Alex Hitchens (Will Smith) tries to charm gossip columnist Sara Melas (Eva Mendes) at the same time he is coaching shy Albert (Kevin James) on how to win the love of beautiful heiress Allegra Cole (Amber Valletta).

programme.title: The Legend Of Zorro
programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Made Of Honor
programme.desc: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.

programme.title: Hope Springs
programme.desc: Arnold and Kay have been married for 30 years, and have drifted apart. To save their marriage, they attend an intense, week-long counseling session to work on their relationship.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Made Of Honor
programme.desc: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: New York "date doctor" Alex Hitchens (Will Smith) tries to charm gossip columnist Sara Melas (Eva Mendes) at the same time he is coaching shy Albert (Kevin James) on how to win the love of beautiful heiress Allegra Cole (Amber Valletta).

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is magically hurtled through space.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: When the old-old-old-fashioned vampire Vlad arrives at the hotel for an impromptu family get-together, Hotel Transylvania is in for a collision of supernatural old-school and modern day cool.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: A grumpy widower forms an unlikely friendship with his new neighbors that turns his world around.

programme.title: The Karate Kid III
programme.desc: John Kreese, ostracised and penniless, tries to take revenge on Daniel and Miyagi with the assistance of a Vietnam War comrade who is the wealthy proprietor of a poisonous waste disposal business.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: In Miami Vice, undercover detectives played by Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell navigate danger, crime, and seduction in a gritty, stylish update of the iconic TV series. Also stars Gong Li.

programme.title: The Legend Of Zorro
programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: Hitch

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: Identical twins - a musician living in New York, and a mechanic living in Hong Kong - are separated in childhood but are unexpectedly reunited years later when the musician travels to Hong Kong for a concert.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer
programme.desc: In a world where magic is waning and technology prevails, 15-year-old Jennifer Strange runs a magician employment agency and discovers the last dragon is being hunted.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: Smurfette and her friends go to the Forbidden Forest to find a lost village. When the evil wizard Gargamel gets to know of this, he devises a plan to stop the smurfs from discovering the town.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Tin Man Part 1
programme.desc: A re-imagining of L. Frank Baum's classic "The Wizard of Oz."

programme.title: Tin Man Part 2
programme.desc: A re-imagining of L. Frank Baum's classic "The Wizard of Oz."

programme.title: Tin Man Part 3
programme.desc: A re-imagining of L. Frank Baum's classic "The Wizard of Oz."

programme.title: Made Of Honor
programme.desc: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.

programme.title: Spy Kids: All The Time In The World
programme.desc: The action packed franchise is backwith the next generation of Spy Kids!

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival, meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Paranormal enthusiasts Abby, Erin, Jillian and Patty set out to capture ghosts when they realise that someone is attempting to cause an apocalypse by summoning ghosts in the city of New York.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, Viola Davis stars in an action-packed story of an elite all-female unit of warriors determined to defend their nation.

programme.title: Transcendence
programme.desc: A brilliant but controversial research scientist becomes obsessed with his quest to create a humanistic machine, leading to a dangerous conclusion.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 1
programme.desc: The worldwide phenomenon continues. Katniss (Jennifer Lawrence) has survived and destroyed the Hunger Games, and now rises with District 13 to fight against President Snow (Donald Sutherland).

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 2
programme.desc: With the nation of Panem in a full scale war, Katniss confronts President Snow in the final showdown.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this John Woo action thriller where a man battles a deadly group that hunts humans for sport. Also features Lance Henriksen and Wilford Brimley.

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw team up to stop a superhuman villain with a deadly bio-weapon in this explosive Fast & Furious spin-off starring Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham, Idris Elba, and more.

programme.title: Tai Chi Master
programme.desc: Two friends, ex Shaolin monks, part ways as they brush with the ongoing rebellion against the government. The ambitious one rises up to be a powerful military commander, while his betrayed friend resorts to learn the calm ways of Tai Chi.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: Selene decides to find a way to end the conflict between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction, who are trying to hunt her down. She tries everything in her hand to save humanity.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 2
programme.desc: With the nation of Panem in a full scale war, Katniss confronts President Snow in the final showdown.

programme.title: Back To The Future III
programme.desc: In Back to the Future Part III, Marty travels to 1885 to save Doc from an outlaw. Packed with laughs, action, and heart, it's the epic Wild West finale to the beloved trilogy.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

programme.title: Tai Chi Master
programme.desc: Two friends, ex Shaolin monks, part ways as they brush with the ongoing rebellion against the government. The ambitious one rises up to be a powerful military commander, while his betrayed friend resorts to learn the calm ways of Tai Chi.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Maersk Alabama, an unarmed US container ship, gets hijacked by Somali pirates, led by Abduwali Muse, en route to Kenya. The ship's captain and Muse soon are at the mercy of uncontrollable forces.

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: In 2084, construction worker Douglas Quaid visits Rekall for a virtual Mars vacationbut the procedure unlocks hidden memories, thrusting him into a deadly rebellion and a secret-agent past.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Chris joins his girlfriend Rose for a weekend at her family's estate. At first, their warm welcome seems like awkwardness about their interracial relationshipuntil disturbing truths emerge.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgement Day
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger reprises his career-changing role as the Terminator in this explosive film that was selected as one of AFI's Top Ten Sci-Fi films of all time.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: Katniss Everdeen has returned home safe after winning the 74th Annual Hunger Games. She senses that a rebellion is simmering, but the Capitol is still very much in control as the next Hunger Games is prepareda competition that could change Panem forever.

programme.title: The Librarian: The Return To King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: Adventurer Flynn Carsen receives a secret map to King Solomon's Mines. When the map is stolen, Flynn sets out to find the map and the Key of Solomon's book, without which the map is useless anyway.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Before Snow White, two queens clash in The Huntsman: Winter's War. Love, betrayal, and war unfold as Huntsman Eric battles evil to save a kingdom from Ravenna's dark reign.

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw team up to stop a superhuman villain with a deadly bio-weapon in this explosive Fast & Furious spin-off starring Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham, Idris Elba, and more.

programme.title: Tears Of The Sun
programme.desc: In Tears of the Sun, a Navy SEAL team is sent to rescue a doctor in war-torn Nigeria. The mission shifts from extraction to saving refugees as they face brutal rebels while navigating the dangerous jungle.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare for its tourists when one of the dinosaurs escapes its enclosure. An ex-military animal expert steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Miami detectives Marcus Burnett and Mike Lowrey are back in a war on the drug Ecstasy on the streets in Miami.

programme.title: The Man With The Iron Fists
programme.desc: RZA co-writes, directs, and stars in this genre-blending, hip-hop-infused kung fu film set in Hong Kong, featuring Russell Crowe, Lucy Liu, and produced by Quentin Tarantino.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this John Woo action thriller where a man battles a deadly group that hunts humans for sport. Also features Lance Henriksen and Wilford Brimley.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Robin Hood in Ridley Scott's epic reimaginingfighting corruption and sparking a rebellion that turns a humble outlaw into a timeless symbol of freedom.

programme.title: The Mummy (2017)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in The Mummy, a thrilling new take on the legend. When an ancient queen awakens in modern times, she unleashes a terrifying force, sparking a battle across continents.

programme.title: The World's End
programme.desc: In "The World's End", Simon Pegg and Nick Frost reunite for an epic pub crawl that turns into a fight for humanity's future. Director Edgar Wright delivers a hilarious mix of nostalgia, comedy, and sci-fi thrills.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: Inspired by real WWII events, this film follows an American submarine crew tasked with capturing a German U-boat carrying the Enigma code machine. A tense, underwater action thriller full of deception, danger, and survival.

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as tough detective John Kimble in Kindergarten Cop, going undercover as a teacher to find a drug lord's wife. Packed with action, humor, and heart, it's a classic comedy-thriller.

programme.title: Moby Dick Part 1
programme.desc: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.

programme.title: Moby Dick Part 2
programme.desc: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: In Wanted, a slacker is recruited by a secret assassin fraternity, uncovering hidden powers and dark truths as he trains under elite killers, including Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman.

programme.desc: Niceness - Griff Rhys Jones begins his exploration of Ontario at Niagara Falls, right on the U.S border, to uncover what it is that makes Canadians so nice.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Channing Tatum - The actor hikes, explores and climbs during his expedition to Yosemite National Park. The pair begin with a helicopter ride, move through dense forest, then eat some dangerous food.

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Monkeys - While in Costa Rica, Patrick investigates the declining population of insects and heads deep into the rainforest to find out just how far and wide this dramatic change is being felt.

programme.title: Big Adventures: Into the Mississippi with Nick Knowles S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Nick starts with a helicopter ride along the northernmost stretch of the Mississippi.

programme.title: Solar System S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Volcano Worlds - Professor Brian Cox explores planets and moons covered in volcanoes. He encounters alien landscapes bursting with fire and ice - eruptions so violent they reach into space.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Vancouver Island - Journey to the wild Pacific coast on the western shore of Vancouver Island in British Columbia. From the peaks of mountain glaciers to the canopies of Canada's only rainforest, nature and human spirit coexist in spectacular habitats.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karina's fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinic's toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet who's quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Queen of Yala - The shadowy forests of Yala National Park are the perfect hideout for secretive leopards. It's time for one young female, Asha, to strike out alone. Join her as she fights for her own territory, finds a mate, and becomes a mother.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Loka the Baby Elephant - Every year, the biggest elephant congregation in Asia occurs in Minneriya National Park. Here in this sacred place, baby Loka is born. Watch as he learns to suckle, swim and handle his trunk among the mle of giants that make up his family.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lake Hunters - Sri Lanka's lowlands are dotted with thousands of seemingly peaceful lakes, but don't be fooled, this is the realm of the mugger crocodile. Muggers are hunters from day one. Watch as these supreme predators compete with each other in the fierce heat.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Web of Life - A manmade lake in Minneriya National Park supports the largest concentration of elephants in Asia. Follow a young male who has reached a turning point toward adulthood. In the rainforest, jungles teem with a variety of bizarre species of insects.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planet's biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa's east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Oceans - Dive to the darkest depths of the sea to uncover the ocean's most mysterious inhabitants. Journey across vast stretches of open water with humpback whales, then wander down to the ocean floor to witness breathtaking bioluminescence.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Coasts - Venture along Earth's coasts, where colliding worlds create a melting pot of biodiversity. Watch orcas hunt with precision, hold on as guillemot chicks take leaps of faith, crawl to safety with turtle hatchlings, and see crabs sculpt sandy galaxies.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Rivers - Trace dazzling waterways all over the world, from volcanic rivers in Russia's far east to geothermal streams in Florida. Watch as beavers transform entire landscapes with their well-engineered dams, then enjoy a winter spa day with manatees.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealand's Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealand's South Island, where one of the world's longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planet's biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa's east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Oceans - Dive to the darkest depths of the sea to uncover the ocean's most mysterious inhabitants. Journey across vast stretches of open water with humpback whales, then wander down to the ocean floor to witness breathtaking bioluminescence.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Coasts - Venture along Earth's coasts, where colliding worlds create a melting pot of biodiversity. Watch orcas hunt with precision, hold on as guillemot chicks take leaps of faith, crawl to safety with turtle hatchlings, and see crabs sculpt sandy galaxies.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Rivers - Trace dazzling waterways all over the world, from volcanic rivers in Russia's far east to geothermal streams in Florida. Watch as beavers transform entire landscapes with their well-engineered dams, then enjoy a winter spa day with manatees.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealand's Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Beasts Of The Big Blue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealand's South Island, where one of the world's longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Baby Animals S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mini Giants - Elephants, gorillas, rhinos, and bison are among the largest and most imposing land-dwelling mammals, but they all start out as helpless infants. See how babies from each species find their way to becoming giants.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Catching Air - Watch beginners make their first leap into the air, like an Andean condor who must attend flight school before spreading its wings. Meet oddballs who soar without feathers and marvel at a peregrine falcon's speed as it dives to catch its prey.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Flight Meals - Go hunting with flyers who excel at making mid-air catches. Watch the metamorphosis of the acrobatic emperor dragonfly, admire the barn owl's stealthy approach to prey, and catch a wandering salamander's death-defying leap into the abyss.

programme.title: Boss Shark
programme.desc: Witness the ultimate battle for dominance as scientists try to pick out the alpha male in a pack of 100-plus great white sharks off the New Zealand coast. Marvel at the speed, hunting prowess, and fearlessness that determine the leader of the pack.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Meerkat Survival School - Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness' flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters' club.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Pirate Birds - Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds, relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog, and decode an African elephant's secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can't see, sound we can't hear and even stranger forces we can't begin to detect.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: From Cloud to Coast - Monsoon storms sweep over the tropical island of Sri Lanka, and water carried in with swirling mists hits the mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the many changing faces of the island's forests.

programme.title: Baby Animals S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mother's Darlings - Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Meerkat Survival School - Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness' flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters' club.

programme.title: Boss Shark: Battle of the Sexes
programme.desc: Witness a shark competition unlike any other, where great whites go head-to-head in jaw-dropping tests of strength. Risk it all with shark specialist Dr. Riley Elliott as he tries to answer an age-old question: Which sex reigns supreme?

programme.title: 13 Hours To Survive S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Trapped at Low Tide - Descend into the tide pool, where a hermit crab house hunts, a baby catshark runs into strange neighbours, and an octopus terrorises prey. Watch seagulls and other creatures hunt on the surface as the heat rises and oxygen depletes in the pool.

programme.title: 13 Hours To Survive S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Count down the seconds as the sun sets and predators prowl around the pool before the tide finally rolls in. Persevere as night falls with a kleptomaniacal slug and an acrobatic scallop, while a pair of sneaky crabs take a dangerous shot at romance.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlotte's tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Life on the Wing - Yala National Park is an avian Eden, home to 215 species of bird. This paradise offers many possibilities for parents who can weather the ever-changing climate. Every species must either raise their offspring here or find a new home before the dry season ends and the monsoon storms begin.

programme.title: Guillaume's Paris S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Guillaume travels to Nature Urbaine, Europe's largest rooftop garden, and uses their produce to make a spring salad, Guillaume catches up with Australian rugby player Kurtley Beale for a meal.

programme.desc: Chef Donal Skehan and his dog Max visit West Cork to meet regional food producers and visit local landmarks.

programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 7 - Jason is in the Dubai Marina as he explores food that looks so good it goes viral.

programme.desc: Weston-super-Mare - George meets DIY renovators Simon and Holly who are transforming a dilapidated Georgian-style crescent house, that was divided into four flats, with a 40,000 budget and no building experience.

programme.title: Grand Designs S21 Ep9
programme.desc: Henley 2024 - Tony and Ara want to create a house of healing dedicated to health and wellbeing, in a beautiful woodland clearing near Henley-on-Thames. But the site is fraught with emotional landmines...

programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 6 - Gemini and James had it all planned out when they bought their three-bed home in Surrey. Expecting a new baby, they would move in and do the place up.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Series 1, Episode 6 - Jamie demonstrates how to make a tasty hot pot just using just root vegetables and later cooks up succulent sticky BBQ chicken, corn and slaw. programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat S3 Ep6
programme.desc: South Wales - Fred and Thomasina Miers sample south Wales' scrumptious offerings, from fantastic flame-grilled fare to unique and unassuming pub grub in Usk.

programme.desc: Liam and Hannah's Shepherd's Hut - Situated in a water meadow in north Dorset, rare breed farmers Liam and Hannah's 1930s shepherd's hut was bought for just 5 almost 40 years ago. Simon and the team help them to restore it.

programme.desc: Faith's Geodome - Simon and the team go to Devon where camp site owner Faith wants to create a unique property using an invention of her late father's. Faith wants the B&B's rooms to have a celestial theme.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Julie and Toby's Castle Turret - Simon's team is in Warwickshire to turn a 200-year-old turret into a medieval-themed B&B. The tiny two-floored building may look like a turret on the outside, but on the inside it's a bland office.

programme.title: The Great South African Bake Off S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Custard Week - It's custard week on The Great South African Bake Off and the bakers kick things off with a Franginpane Tart with Crme Anglaise. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin's time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn't work quite how they'd hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before it's gone forever!

programme.desc: Charger's Christmas Adventure - Charger helps the Paw Patrol rescue Santa and his helpers when a blizzard at the North Pole threatens Christmas.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Pups on Ice / Pups and the Snow Monster - Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep207
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Family / The House of Barbapapa - Barbapapa finds refuge in the house that Franois' parents built for him. The house of Barbapapa is far too small now that Barbamama and the Barbabb have arrived in his life.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Spaceland / New Rocket / Babysitting - Tim, Tommy and Tia get lost at a play centre. Tim tries to find a new rocket that's perfect for him. Tim tries to bend all the rules when Terri comes to babysit.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep211
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Mr. Ducky-Doo A Special Diving Board / The Crew Builds A Rainwater Tank - Mayor Greatway asks Rubble & Crew to build something special for her friend Mr. Ducky-Doo. But soon a construction mystery is afoot...

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep309
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Alphorn - Farmer Zoe has a new goat on her farm! But when she can't find the singing goat, the pups team up with Park Ranger Rose.

programme.title: DORA S4 Ep401
programme.desc: Backpack's Charm / Lost Banana Blankie - Dora and Boots help Backpack find her lost friendship charm and make it even better than before! Dora helps Boots find his lost banana blankie before it's bedtime at the sleepover party!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep706
programme.desc: The Snowflake Games - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep212
programme.desc: The Invasion / Prank Day - Barbalala receives a package and discovers little pink animals inside, which she calls the SQUEAKIES. Barbabravo, Barbalala and Barbabeau are fed up with their siblings' teasings.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1014
programme.desc: Charger's Christmas Adventure - Charger helps the Paw Patrol rescue Santa and his helpers when a blizzard at the North Pole threatens Christmas.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Pups on Ice / Pups and the Snow Monster - Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Toy / Astrofools / Mole - Tim does all he can to get the new DinoStar toy. It's a day for practical jokes, but Tim doesn't know when to stop. Tim and Dad have to catch a troublesome mole.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep304
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Auntie Day Present - It's Auntie Day! But can the pups finish building their present for Auntie Crane in time?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep701
programme.desc: Sparkle's Big Rescue - When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep722
programme.desc: The Ice Treasure - After discovering an ice road that leads to a giant ice treasure, Blaze, AJ, Watts and Gabby go an adventure to find out what's inside!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep201
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Roller Coaster/The Crew Builds Motor A Play Space - When Speed Meister's rollercoaster sends a pet playdate out of control, Rubble & Crew save the day with a bigger, better, and safer coaster.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep302
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Hotel Elevator / The Crew Builds A Popcorn-Cat Caf - Rubble & Crew steps in to help at Hotel Hadley after a snowy surprise. But when the stairs aren't fast enough, it's time to bow wow build!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes A Road - When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1014
programme.desc: Charger's Christmas Adventure - Charger helps the Paw Patrol rescue Santa and his helpers when a blizzard at the North Pole threatens Christmas.

programme.desc: Pups on Ice / Pups and the Snow Monster - Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: From One Pit to Another - The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Moving Mission / Barbabright's Invention - During a walk, the Barbapapa family discovers a megalith. Barbabright has a stroke of genius: the invention of the "BAM".

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Shooting Star / Ball / Balloon - Tim, Tommy, Tia and Dad get stuck on a remote asteroid. Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom. Tia's new balloon gets stuck in a tree, so Tim tries to get it down.

programme.title: DORA S4 Ep401
programme.desc: Backpack's Charm / Lost Banana Blankie - Dora and Boots help Backpack find her lost friendship charm and make it even better than before! Dora helps Boots find his lost banana blankie before it's bedtime at the sleepover party!

programme.title: DORA S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Run Cynthia Run / Dora In Space - Dora and Boots get help from Carmelo the Condor to fix their friend's running shoes in time for the rainforest race! Dora and Boots rescue Tico from space after his spaceship falls apart!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep225
programme.desc: Finloose / Operation Ernie - When dancing is outlawed in Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark will do whatever it takes to get the town dancing again! Baby and William try to help Ernie make a best friend.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep501
programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Movies - It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Circus - Bluey is the ringmaster in a game of circus with her friends, but Hercules wants to play his motorcycle game instead. Luckily, Bluey has a solution to keep everyone happy.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Road Trip - Mum helps Bluey and Bingo find ways to entertain themselves on a family road trip, while Dad tries to stay ahead of the grey nomad convoy or risk camping near the toilets.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Curry Quest - Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Explorers - While waiting to be picked up from school, Jack plays at being a sailor trying to find his way back home to Australia. Meanwhile, Jack's Dad has got lost on route to collect him.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Puppets - Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go awry when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Exercise - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep42
programme.desc: Show and Tell - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Tato Team - During the Veggies' Super Sidekick Costume Contest, Evil Pea traps Supertato in a jar of honey. All is lost until the Veggies become real super sidekicks, the Tato Team!

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Veg-O-Vision Song Contest - Supertato and the Tato Team must battle to save Tato Tower from Evil Pea's earth-shaking stomping performance at the Veg-O-Vision Song Contest.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Tato Tower Sleepover - Supertato invites Evil Pea to his sleepover, but Carrot is suspicious and vows to stay up all night to make sure she can't unleash any of her evil plans.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Super Sandcastle - Supertato and the Veggies have built a super sandcastle, but Evil Pea wants to storm it by firing her hordes of Mini Peas at it with her pea shooter.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Walkie Talkie - The veggies are playing walkie-talkie hide-and-seek, but Evil Pea steals Carrot's walkie-talkie and uses it to trick the Veggies into getting trapped by the Corn Cobs.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Evil Pea's Party Plan - It's Evil Pea's birthday, but she and Carrot are trapped in the bottom of her freezer. They must put their differences aside and work together to escape.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Sweetieland Saga - Evil Pea cheats Chilli out of winning floofy teddies at a funfair made from sweets, so Supertato and the Veggies must get the teddies back before it's too late!

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Monstertato - Evil Pea creates an evil version of her nemesis, Supertato. With the help of her hench-Cobs, Evil Pea makes a big, green lumbering spud that she names Monstertato!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep56
programme.desc: Bath Night - Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep25
programme.desc: It's Time for a Surprise - JoJo, Gran Gran and Panda are helping Cynthia in her garden - JoJo loves how tall the sunflowers are. Cynthia gives JoJo a present of some sunflower seeds - JoJo can keep them ready to plant and grow more sunflowers next year.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep24
programme.desc: It's Time to Make a Family Tree - Great-Gran Gran shows JoJo an old family photo - it's fun spotting Gran Gran, Mummy and Great-Gran Gran when they were younger. JoJo recognises some people, but there are lots of members of her family that she's never met before.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Pond Prose - Sarah is inspired by listening to a poetry record and decides to make up some poetry of her own.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Moon's Exhibition - A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep17
programme.desc: Lorenzo's Solo - Lorenzo decides to play a dangerous trick on his loyal coach Beppe.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Octopus - When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Bluey's game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand or enjoy, until they both realize they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Bin Night - Bluey, Bingo and Dad always take out the bins. Over a few weeks, Bingo tells Dad about a new kid at kindy who is mean to her and Mum offers some good advice.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Muffin Cone - When Muffin can't stop sucking her thumb, she has to wear a cone of shame. But the cone gets in her way and she can no longer play `sandwich shop' with Bluey and Bingo.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Ahoy Captain Pak Choi - Supertato and Broccoli go on a pirate adventure with Captain Pak Choi, but they don't realise she intends on plundering Evil Pea's freezer and stealing all her shiny things.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep1
programme.desc: The Tooth Brushing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep2
programme.desc: The Duck Badge - The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Potato Time - At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep28
programme.desc: The Aqueduct of Segovia - Cartoon following four adventure-seeking superheroes as they explore exciting places all around the world.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Grandmaster Glitch wants to watch his favourite DVD in peace, so uses his remote control to pause the Rio Carnival in Brazil!

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Mount Everest, Asia - Kyan wants to climb Mount Everest, but his daring plan is interrupted by Grandmaster Glitch, who's careering down the mountain in a giant snowball.

programme.title: My World Kitchen S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Zahra-Rose's Somalian Nafaqo - Zahra-Rose's dish is Somalian nafaqo, made using mashed potato stuffed with boiled egg.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Lar Gibbons - Andy encounters some baby Lar Gibbons in Thailand that appear to be flying as they swing through the rainforest.

programme.desc: Castle Calamity - Rori is building a castle with building blocks, which intrigues everyone.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Camping - While on a camping holiday, Bluey makes a new friend named called Jean-Luc. Bluey may not understand him, but they find a common language playing and hunting for a wild Daddy pig.

programme.desc: Grannies - A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep13

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep24
programme.desc: It's Time to Make a Family Tree - Great-Gran Gran shows JoJo an old family photo - it's fun spotting Gran Gran, Mummy and Great-Gran Gran when they were younger. JoJo recognises some people, but there are lots of members of her family that she's never met before.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Pond Prose - Sarah is inspired by listening to a poetry record and decides to make up some poetry of her own.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: The fact that Japan is very dry in winter greatly increases the risk of fire. We learn tips for preventing fires occurring and how to respond effectively when a fire breaks out.
